title: A request for an item
description: Request for an item that might be at a different location or already checked out to another patron

requestType.description: Whether the item should be held upon return, recalled or paged for

requesterId.description: ID of the user who made the request

proxyUserId.description: ID of the user representing a proxy for the patron

itemId.description: ID of the item being requested

cancellationReasonId.description: The id of the request reason

cancelledByUserId.description: The id of the user that cancelled the request

position.description: position of the request in a per-item request queue

item.description: Information about the requested item (some of which is stored and used for searching and sorting)

holdingsRecordId.description: The ID of the holdings for the item

instanceId.description: The ID of the instance for the item

location.description: The effective location of the item

requester.description: Copy of some requesting patron metadata (used for searching and sorting), will be taken from the user referred to by the requesterId

firstName.description: first name of the patron (read only, defined by the server)

lastName.description: last name of the patron (read only, defined by the server)

middleName.description: middle name of the patron (read only, defined by the server)

barcode.description: barcode of the patron (read only, defined by the server)

patronGroupId.description: UUID for the patron group that this user belongs to

patronGroup.description: record for the user's patron group

group.description: The unique name of the patron group

desc.description: A description of the patron group

proxy.description: Copy of some proxy patron metadata (used for searching and sorting), will be taken from the user referred to by the proxyUserId

firstName.description: first name of the proxy patron (read only, defined by the server)

lastName.description: last name of the proxy patron (read only, defined by the server)

middleName.description: middle name of the proxy patron (read only, defined by the server)

barcode.description: barcode of the proxy patron (read only, defined by the server)

patronGroupId.description: UUID for the patrongroup that this user belongs to

group.description: The unique name of the patrongroup

fulfilmentPreference.description: How should the request be fulfilled (whether the item should be kept on the hold shelf for collection or delivered to the requester)

deliveryAddressTypeId.description: Deliver to the address of this type, for the requesting patron

deliveryAddress.description: Address the item is to be delivered to (derived from requester information)

addressTypeId.description: Type of address (refers to address types)

holdShelfExpirationDate.description: Date when an item returned to the hold shelf expires

pickupServicePointId.description: The ID of the Service Point where this request can be picked up

pickupServicePoint.description: The full object of the Service Point record from pickupServicePointId

name.description: Unique name for the service point

code.description: Unique code for the service point

discoveryDisplayName.description: Human-readable name for the service point

pickupLocation.description: Is this service point a pickup location?

metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to requests, provided by the server (client should not provide)
